description: Juliette March and her two best friends are witches. The three make a blood oath never to desert their coven. But Juliette is corrupted by her power, and decides to fuck around with one of her witch sister's boyfriends; seducing him by magic. When her sisters find out she pays the price in rock hard phantom cock. Rough Sex, Anal, Throat Fucking, DP, DV, DA, & Bukkake!
title: Slut Craft- Good little witches don't abandon their coven!
